SEARCH
Package com.game.Characters

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.game.Utilities.Position
com.game.Characters.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Hero
public abstract class Character extends Position
Abstract base class for all game characters, providing common attributes and functionality.

This class encapsulates the main attributes shared by all characters present in the game world, excluding the main menu. It includes movement mechanics, animation handling, and collision detection, among others. Characters derived from this class can be either player-controlled or AI-driven entities within the game environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      protected Character(int speed, MainGamePanel gamePanel)
      Constructs a Character with specified movement speed and associates it with a game panel.
      Parameters:
      speed - the movement speed of the character
      gamePanel - the game panel the character belongs to

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultPosition

      protected abstract void setDefaultPosition()
      Sets the default position of the character within the game world. Must be implemented by subclasses to define initial character placement.

    • getImage

      public abstract void getImage()
      Loads the character's image resources. Must be implemented by subclasses to specify character appearance.

    • setAction

      public void setAction()
      Performs the character's current action, which may include movement or other behaviors. Can be overridden by subclasses to define specific character actions.

    • getGamePanel

      public MainGamePanel getGamePanel()

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the current image at the character's position. The method first updates the current image based on the character's direction, then it draws that image on the given Graphics2D context at the current X and Y position. The size of the image is determined by the tile size of the game panel.
      Parameters:
      g2 - The Graphics2D context on which the image will be drawn.

    • setMovementSpeed

      public void setMovementSpeed(int speed)
      Updates the character's movement speed.
      Overrides:
      setMovementSpeed in class Position
      Parameters:
      speed - the new movement speed of the character

    • checkCollision

      public void checkCollision()

    • searchPath

      public void searchPath(int goalCol, int goalRow)
      Initiates pathfinding from the character's current position to a specified goal.
      Parameters:
      goalCol - the column index of the goal position
      goalRow - the row index of the goal position
